Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 43rd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2008...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Los Angeles (A) on 5/30/2008 (Going to PIT: P L. Lynn, SS J. Herrera. Going to LAA: CF L. Schafer)...
Injured on 8/14/2008 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/8/2009 with a Stiff Neck, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/20/2009 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Boston on 6/30/2009 (Going to BOS: CF L. Schafer, P E. Pitcher, P B. Ayala. Going to LAA: CF S. Victorino, P I. West)...
Had first career hit on 9/18/2010, off Brad Penny (LAA)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/3/2011, off Dustin Williams (TB)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Minnesota on 5/21/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/23/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Tampa Bay on 2/14/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
